rules_text:
{UB}, {T}: Target player mills two cards. Each opponent loses 1 life for each creature card milled this way. You gain 1 life for each artifact card milled this way.
{1}{UB}, Pay 2 life: Create an Ether Cylinder token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Untap target permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
